job_purpose: Immersive Technologies is seeking a passionate and curious 3D Developer to contribute to innovative training solutions in the mining industry.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Modelling and texturing 3D assets for real-time rendering.
Contributing to the development of engaging 3D training products using tools like Unity.
Embracing feedback and continuously improving skills and outputs.
Working independently and collaboratively within a team environment to bring training concepts to life.
Managing project deliverables to meet minimum quality levels within deadlines.
required_qualifications: Strong foundation in 3D modelling and UV unwrapping.
Solid grasp of various texturing techniques using industry standard software.
Eye for detail in hard surface modelling and real-time environments.
Organisation skills, including efficient file management and version control.
Experience with Unity, Substance Painter, Photoshop.
preferred_qualifications: Interest in scripting (Javascript or C#), animation, or video/audio production.
Background in game development, CGI, or digital media.
company_details: Immersive Technologies is a global leader in simulator-based training solutions for the mining industry. The company specializes in developing digital learning solutions that change how mining professionals learn and perform in the field. Immersive Technologies values collaboration, creativity, and innovation in creating impactful training products.
